## Showing the data

```{r}
post_meal_data
glimpse(post_meal_data)
```

```{r}
?colnames
help(colnames)
```

```{r ggplot}

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()

```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Dist. of BMI"
#| label: fig-bmi-histo
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
This is my figure (@fig-bmi-histo)

## Excersice: discrete plots
```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Grouping"
#| label: fig-group-bar
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = Group)) +
  geom_bar()
```

See @fig-group-bar above for a cool plot!
